verses.name: Matthew 13:27
verses.text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him, Sir, didst not thou sow good seed in thy field? from whence then hath it tares?

verses.name: Matthew 13:28
verses.text: He said unto them, An enemy hath done this. The servants said unto him, Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up?

verses.name: Matthew 13:29
verses.text: But he said, Nay; lest while ye gather up the tares, ye root up also the wheat with them.
